name: conquest

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
CONQUEST is a DFT code designed for large-scale calculations, with
excellent parallelisation.

dependencies.name: blas
dependencies.description: A BLAS and LAPACK wrapper library with runtime exchangable backends

dependencies.name: lapack
dependencies.description: A BLAS and LAPACK wrapper library with runtime exchangable backends

dependencies.name: scalapack
dependencies.description:
ScaLAPACK is a library of high-performance linear algebra routines for
parallel distributed memory machines

dependencies.name: fftw-api
dependencies.description:
Arm Compiler combines the optimized tools and libraries from Arm with a
modern LLVM-based compiler framework.

dependencies.name: libxc
dependencies.description:
Libxc is a library of exchange-correlation functionals for density-
functional theory.

dependencies.name: mpi
dependencies.description:
Mvapich2 is a High-Performance MPI Library for clusters with diverse
networks (InfiniBand, Omni-Path, Ethernet/iWARP, and RoCE) and computing
platforms (x86 (Intel and AMD), ARM and OpenPOWER)
